name: 5 Horror Minigames [DEMO]
description:
5 Horror Minigames is a game, which contains 5 horror minigames, with separate stories (or not) with a "retro" style, each minigame is unique and has a macabre story in the background. Make theories, enter doors, look for the damn crowbar, but the truth behind these minigames, you may never know.

It's just an prototype!
